author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4912-PPSA23637_00-0804461046646679

The Ultimate Roguelike Shoot’em Up is coming to PS5 - Steredenn: Binary Stars!

Steredenn is a frenetic space shooter and roguelite all in big pixels. Your goal? Climb aboard your ship to take on fearsome space pirates in a race for the highest possible score!

 - Fast, brutal combat with infinite replayability!
 - Boss Rush & Daily Challenge modes - Climb the leaderboards!
 - Solo or local co-op – Test your friendship in high-stakes battles!

Are u ready to defeat these space pirates?

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Steredenn: Binary Stars - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Lynked: Banner of the Spark is launching on PlayStation 5 on May 22, 2025!

Build a bright new world alongside a band of rescued robot buddies! In this colorful action RPG, battle waves of enemies in solo or co-op, then return home and use their parts to craft a thriving town. Assemble your crew and grow stronger with each new adventure!

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Lynked: Banner of the Spark - 1.0 and Console Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010574/

Sunderfolk launches April 23, 2025 on PS5!

Rediscover Game Night with the magic of Sunderfolk, a new turn-based tactical RPG adventure where you use your mobile device as your controller.  Built with the couch co-op experience in mind, up to four players can play together as you adventure through the magical and dangerous Sunderlands.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Sunderfolk - Launch Date Announce Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
We’ve been pouring our hearts into every detail to bring Bywater to life. Gather ‘round as we go behind-the-scenes into the making of our heart-warming game, Tales of the Shire.

Tales of the Shire launches July 29 on PS5.

#ps5 #ps5games
title: Tales of the Shire -  An Inside Look: Behind the Heart and Art of Bywater | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/monster-hunter-wilds/

Join us on March 25 at 7am PT/2pm GMT for the Monster Hunter Wilds Showcase, hosted by producer Ryozo Tsujimoto! We'll take the wraps off the of the first Free Title Update coming in early April, bringing Mizutsune to the Forbidden Lands, as well as a host of other new additions. 
-------
About Monster Hunter Wilds
Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series.

You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands.

Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series in Monster Hunter Wilds, available now on PS5!

#ps5 #ps5games #monsterhunterwilds
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - March 2025 Showcase | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Add Tour de France 2025 to your wishlist now.

A new era begins for Tour de France games. With the transition to a new graphics engine, Unreal Engine 5, you can enjoy enhanced visual quality and experience the roads of the Grande Boucle and other iconic races like never before.

With completely reworked landscapes and more realistic lighting effects, the Tour de France experience has never been closer to reality. Discover legendary locations of the sport, now depicted with even greater accuracy: Champs-Élysées, Trouée d’Arenberg, Mont Ventoux, Mur de Huy, and many more are waiting to be explored in Tour de France 2025.

In Tour de France 2025, you will now have the ability to create private games and challenge your friends on the road. A brand-new feeding system is also being introduced, revolutionizing race strategies.

Among other new features, the Criterium Mode now offers new rewards and five online leaderboards, along with the addition of new Courses and Descents of the Moment,
title: Tour de France 2025 - Announcement Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/minecraft/

The Spring to Life drop brings more reasons to explore both near and far! Warm winds have swept across biomes, bringing new mob variants, ambient sounds, and lush plants for you to discover. Befriend fluffy pigs, marvel at glittering firefly bushes, listen out for whispers of sand, and delight in a blooming Overworld humming with new beginnings. Play the Spring to life drop in Minecraft now!

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #minecraft
title: Minecraft - Spring to Life Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

description:

Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 1 drops on April 3, 2025! 
 
🦊 Mizutsune
❕ Zoh Shia hunt & gear
🎉 The Grand Hub
⚡ Arch-Tempered Rey Dau
🌸 Festival of Accord: Blossomdance
 
The hunt continues in May with another update, bringing a collaboration with a Capcom series, plus other additional features. 

And in Free Title Update 2 this summer, a long-awaited monster re-emerges...

About Monster Hunter Wilds
Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series.

You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands.

Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series in Monster Hunter Wilds, available now on PS5!
